title: Add --commit flag to tlog done
description:
Allow agents to optionally record the commit SHA that completed a task. This creates an audit trail linking tasks to their implementing commits.

Implementation:
- Add optional --commit <sha> flag to done command
- Add Commit field to Event struct (for status events)
- Store commit with the done status event
- Display commit in 'tlog show' output when present
- Include commit hash in 'tlog prime' recent section for done tasks

Documentation:
- Update workflow section in CmdPrime() to mention committing and logging the commit
- Update command help text

Design decisions:
- Optional, not required (not all tasks result in commits)
- No validation (trust the agent)
- Single commit (use --note for ranges if needed)
- Accept any format (short SHA, full SHA, etc.)
